name: PHATurator
headline: Colour Your Sound
discountText: Reduced price only applies to Founder's Month, first 1000 customers

overview.title:
Masterclass In
Saturation
overview.card1Title: Stacking saturations has never been this easy.
overview.card1Text: Get the weight and character of multi-stage saturation at the click of a button.
overview.description1: In top studios, engineers routinely layer analogue saturations across sources to achieve richer harmonics, better depth, and controlled tonal grit without reaching for extreme settings on any one unit.
overview.description2: The range of tones available from blending these six analogue-inspired stages takes you from subtle warmth to dirty fuzz. Like all fedDSP units, the controls are so simple that there's nothing to learn, and no distractions - you can use your ears, and your emotions, to mix.
overview.card2Text: Each saturation model is obsessively engineered to capture the behaviour and character of its analogue original.
overview.card3Text: We've removed the friction of legacy software. No dongles, no internet requirements, and no barriers to your workflow. Engineered for maximum speed and efficiency, our plugins are light enough to run across your entire session, and fast enough for real-time tracking.

testimonials.quote: I think PHAT is gonna be one of those level game changers. I literally can't work without it now! I use it on pretty much every track.
testimonials.author: Bob Cooper

testimonials.quote: The layout is really intuitive so the learning curve was minimal. I really enjoyed that the finer details were tucked away.
testimonials.author: Sam Bloor

testimonials.quote: The depth knob is rad! It instantly pushes elements back or pulls them forward without messing with phase.
testimonials.author: Neil Kennedy

items.title: Thin Drums
items.text: Adds weight and punch without turning harsh. Get analog density instantly.

items.title: Sterile Guitars
items.text: Adds density and bite without digital fizz. Makes them sit in the midrange.

items.title: Spiky Vocals
items.text: Makes them forward and present without getting harsh. Smooths transients naturally.

items.title: Plugin Hopping? Stop.
items.text: When you're not sure what to use, PHAT will get you 90% there with just a couple of moves. It's the "make it better" button for professional mixing.

items.title: Boring Loops?
items.text: Inject life and energy into static samples immediately.

items.title: Zero Latency
items.text: Track through it. Mix with it. Live perform with it. No delay.

items.title: Lightweight on CPU
items.text: Put it on every channel. We optimized the DSP for maximum instance count.

items.title: Offline Licensing
items.text: Install. Authorize once (offline supported). Work forever. No internet checks.

items.a: PHATurator is an analogue-modeled multi-stage saturation plugin. Unlike standard saturators that offer just one flavour, PHATurator lets you stack and blend six distinct analogue circuits—from Tube and Tape to FET and Class A Preamp styles—to colour your sound with rich harmonics, depth, and controlled grit. It also features a global Mix knob for instant parallel processing.

PHATurator includes six distinct saturation algorithms:
  • FET: Detector-driven dynamics (76-style feel) for punch and control.
  • TUBE: Classic tube saturation to make sources fuller and harmonically rich.
  • TAPE: Vintage glue, tasty saturation, and subtle stereo width.
  • PUNCH: Large-format British console saturation with tight low end, snappy transients, and assertive upper mids.
  • PHAT: Fuller low-mid punch with pleasing compression-like behaviour. Very loudness-friendly.
  • WARMTH: Thick, transformer-rich 70s British Class A preamp vibe with creamy low mids.

items.q: What formats does it come in?
items.a: We provide VST3, AU (Audio Unit), and AAX formats for both Mac and Windows.

items.q: Does it work on M1/M2/M3 Macs?
items.a: Yes. PHATurator is fully native for Apple Silicon chips (M1, M2, M3 etc) as well as Intel Macs. No Rosetta required.

items.q: What DAWs does it work on?
items.a: It works in any DAW that supports VST3, AU, or AAX plugins. This includes Logic Pro X, Pro Tools, Ableton Live, Cubase, Studio One, FL Studio, Reaper, and Bitwig.

Mac: macOS 10.13 or higher (Intel or Apple Silicon).
Windows: Windows 10 or 11 (64-bit).
General: 4GB RAM required (8GB recommended), 500MB free disk space.

items.q: How many computers can I install it on?
items.a: Our license allows for 3 simultaneous activations per user (e.g. your studio machine, your laptop, and a travel rig).
Yes, you can download a 14-day fully functional trial from our Downloads page.
Yes, you can read the full User Manual here.

overview.title: Precision Limiting
overview.card1Text: Crystal clear limiting with zero latency.
overview.description1: LeONE is a dual limiter with zero latency, making it very useful for tracking and live work.
overview.description2: With a Release envelope that can move from 2 seconds all the way to 0.01 milliseconds, brutal limiting with LeONE is perfectly possible.
overview.card2Text: Advanced options are there at the click of a button when you need them.
overview.card3Text: Designed for live tracking and performance.

overview.title: Explosive FET
overview.card1Text: Explosive FET compression with instant attack.
overview.description1: We went back to all the classic FET compressors that we know and love, and created the FIERY from the best unique elements of each.
overview.description2: The two transformers - pre and post compression - activate our unique Analogue Drift Recreation (ADR) algorithm.
overview.card2Text: Switch between classic saturated tones and modern punch.
overview.card3Text: Recreates the analogue movement found in hardware units.
